title: Plane_Shooting_Problem_Dynamic_Programming
abstract: Introduction  The nation is at war. The enemy send out a squadron of $n$ planes to attack our troops from various angles. You have a very precise anti-aircraft launcher that will be used to shoot enemy planes. If the launcher is aimed directly at an enemy plane, it's guaranteed to destroy the plane. Unfortunately, your launcher is ponderous to reposition. Namely, you can only move 1 degree per mi

title: LSTM-RNN_For_Sentiment_Analysis
abstract: Baseline algorithm (Demo code from Keras) Firstly we execute [imdb_lstm.py](https://github.com/fchollet/keras/blob/master/examples/imdb_lstm.py)[1] and yields following results where a test accuracy of 82.35% is acquired.   \`\`\`python '''Trains a LSTM on the IMDB sentiment classification task.
